title: Motley Fool Money: 12 03 2010
description: The EU tries to contain the crisis in Ireland. Pepsi scores in Russia.  Google bids for Groupon.  And Abecrombie & Fitch reports some fashionable sales growth.  On this week's show, we'll talk about those stories and talk with Vanguard founder John Bogle, author of Don't Count On It:  Reflections on Investment Illusions, Capitalism, "Mutual" Funds, Indexing, Entrepreneurship, Idealism, and Heroes.
